评论详情: Sent me used shoes how disgusting!
Comfortable, color is great and there are strippers on the ends of the laces. Also comes with another set of different colored laces. Great for casual ware.
Wear them every day. Super comfortable and durable. Wash super easy. They fit great. They're just perfect.

评论概述: I really wanted to love these shoes…
评论详情: …. obviously on behalf of my husband, but unfortunately, they did not fit him. And the size that I ordered IS his size. And just to make sure, for good measure, I even ordered it in “wide”. And they still managed to be too tight on him too small. Granted, my husband has very large feet, but according to the size requirements in the sneakers, they should have fit him. And though I’m disappointed that they did not, I can still attest to that these shoes appear to be made quite well. I remember them being very very light weight in the hand. And they’re just quite nice looking. So just be aware of the possible size issue, and order accordingly.
The best zero drop shoe I have found. Definitely made well. They come with inserts. Super comfortable and light weight. Best bang for your buck. Totally worth it

These are pretty good barefoot/minimalist shoes.  They talk a lot to get used to if you haven’t worn shoes like this before as you have to get your feet used to a different style.  The toe box is extremely wide so it can look a little funny, but it feels so good to not have your toes squished.
Ran small  Returned
Bought these for my nephew He said they are super comfortable

The design is fantastic. It’s a comfortable shoe but it didn’t fit me :( the smallest size they carry is a 9 in men (42 UK). I wish this company would offer smaller sizes because then I’d buy a bunch!

I purchased these shoes because I was needing a cheap priced pair of shoes that I wouldn't mind ruining at work. And that's exactly what I got they fit to size, they are fairly comfortable, And I've worked in them for a few weeks now and haven't had any issues with them falling apart. The only thing I didn't really like about them was the shape of the toe instead of rounded like most shoes this style this pair is almost square. It's a very odd look but I use them for work shoes so I'm not worried about the appearance
Purchased these as a church shoe for my husband. He loves them. Very comfortable and stylish. Good fit.

I've recently started walking a few miles a day and my feet have been hurting like crazy. I tried getting some highly cushioned walking/running shoes but that seems to mask the issue.. eventually my feet would still ache. I never thought of myself as having wide feet but knew most shoes don't give enough room for toes to keep its natural shape. Trying these barefoot shoes I instantly felt the difference! The shoes themselves are very thin but soft faux leather, almost feels like wearing a thick sock. I like the insoles but the cork top ripped off on the first wear..  the quality is decent but there's a dimple in the toe box that makes it look cheap/flimsy. I love that they don't look completely like clown shoes!! I'll add a side by side and you really can't tell a difference without staring hard. Overall it's great but wish they polished it further maybe for an extra $10 or so.
True to size. Lightweight for every day use. If you have wide feet this is a great option. Easy to clean and the design is well made. Good quality.

评论概述: SO glad I found these. Buy them.
评论详情: Premise: I’ve owned Feelgrounds barefoot shoes for a couple years now. I love them, but they’re pricey. But I had yet to find an alternative that look just as good.  I got these in the mail today and I couldn’t be happier. They felt weird to wear at first, but then I took the sole out and they are PERFECT. So glad they figured people would take the sole out as well.  They’re look very similar to normal shoes, they’re comfortable, and the no tie strings are the cherry on top.  And for $40?! No brainer.  I can literally replace these 3x before I meet the price of my Feelgrounds. So if they last even a few months before getting tattered, I’d be happy.  Take it from someone who has been wearing barefoot shoes for a couple years and also cares about style, these are it. I’ll be ordering more.  Buy them!
Just what I needed for just the right price. These shoes are comfy. They fit right, are good quality and are light. I will be buying more!

I got these for my husband; they are a perfect fit and they look great on him.  They're very comfortable and while it has the look of ties, they slip on and off, which is perfect for him.  They're very stylish and perfect for year-round wear.  The list price is very reasonable given the quality.
These shoes are comfortable and fit true to size.  They are a little too wide and you can definitely see that by looking at them.  They seem to be good quality and a good price.

I didn't expect this shoe to be as comfortable as it is. It's very natural (hence "barefoot") which is what I expected. Great quality, easy to slip on in a hurry. No strings to tie. Yep, I'm an old man now.

My son likes these shoes. He says that it feels like he doesn't really have any shoes on at all. Since he's the kind of kid that would rather be barefoot than come within 10 feet of a shoe, I'd say that's pretty good.
Good pair of minimalist barefoot shoes. Goes well with sweats or jeans. A bit snug with cork insoles. I just took them so they are roomy. I plan on buying more.

Barefoot name fits well with these sneakers, very lightweight, breathable, easy to put on and off, no need to tie laces, they really feel comfortable, allowing your toes to feel free and not constricted by the traditional pointy end. Good for many uses,I like mine for flying long distances so I don’t have to take them off.

评论概述: Like the shoes but wrong size
评论详情: Like the fabric and tie system and I think I like the sole but not sure because they're the wrong size.

These Barefoot wide toe sneakers look much nicer on the picture than in reality. The shoe does feel very comfortable to wear but it lacks quality.  When the shoes arrived, they have already a big dent in the from left shoe. Also the sides of the shoes were wrinkled and deformed. Little fibers from the cloth part and also the sole were coming off. I wish the quality would be better for the price that you pay.

So I really did not know what I was getting into with these shoes. Besides being extremely comfortable, the shape of the toe is really interesting. It's much more like the shape of a foot than like a traditional shoe is and I really, really like that. These shoes go on very easily and look great with many different types of pants or shorts. They're actually so comfortable, I don't always wear them with socks.

I knew the fact that these were wide would make them look a bit odd, but they honestly resemble clown shoes. Easy to slip on, easy to work the laces and fairly comfortable. Despite being wide my toes hurt in them but I think that's because there's little cushion inside. Not very attractive, mildly uncomfortable, but seemingly well made.
True to size and looks great. Very comfortable and I have worn for 8 hours with no issues.
These are OK they feel klunky when you walk and come loose even with the draw string locks tightend other than that they are good quality.
I keep saying I won't get more shoes, then something like this crosses my feed. They look so cool! I love the look and feel of wide toed shoes. They did squeak a bit at Walmart, though.

评论概述: Pulltop Barefoot Wide Toe Box Shoes for Men
评论详情: My husband sometimes has trouble finding shoes that fit his foot properly, and these have been perfect! They are very comfortable and lightweight. It seems well-made and will hopefully last him a while.

It's not as obvious in the pictures on the website, but these shoes are truly goofy looking clown shoes.  Yes, it's wide, yes, it's comfortable, if not running a little larger than usual size.  It has so much potential, but the design is just too wide and goofy.  Clown Shoes.  If I wear this around, I'll be a laughingstock and not in a good way.  I cannot recommend these shoes.  Maybe for a costume in Halloween.  But in real life, in a professional environment, at school, at the office, this is a big no.

These are the best wide toe box shoes! I’ve spent thousands on barefoot shoes and always try new pairs when they come out. Just tried these $40 ones from amazon and they destroy all the $200+ pairs I’ve tried. Highly recommend.

评论概述: Shoe lacing system is the problem!
评论详情: These could be excellent shoes, but they've opted for this slip on elastic shoe-lace, red clip, mess.  I guess they're "pull tops" - lame.  It's not cool, hip, trendy, or whatever, just looks stupid and makes the shoes only suitable for casual bumming around.  If you want to use these for anything remotely active, your feet are going to slide around in the shoe, which isn't ideal, or even concerning for rolling your ankle.I wish brands would quit trying to do silly things like this, or just offer it as an option.For the white version, you can probably find a nice replacement pair of laces to make the shoe good.  For for the other colors - don't think that's happening.  You're not going to be able to match them up well enough.  So you're stuck with a bad lacing system and a sub-par performance shoe.

After developing some foot pain, I switched to barefoot style shoes to increase my foot health.  It has taken a couple of months to see a difference, but the difference is substantial.  These shoes are great, very comfortable, and they have the room to move your toes and not squeeze your foot.  They offer plenty of protection, while offering the barefoot flexibility and agility.  They are well made and comfortable.  The minimalist design offers a small amount of cushion and zero drop, like most barefoot style shoes.  I easily recommend these and will be getting more myself.

These shoes are awesome. They fit perfectly and the wide toe is so comfy for my wide feet. After wearing them i see why they call them "bare feet" because when wearing them it really does feel like there's almost nothing on your feet minus the rough surface you're walking on. Overall I love these shoes so much and definitely will pick up another different color.
I don't usually pay attention to compliments but I was surprised to get a few for these shoes. I got them for comfort but they do look good as well.

These are great! Look super white and plush. Specially if you have wide feet like me? These are definitely for you.  Feels great wearing it, Pretty easy to slip your legs in without much complications.  HOWEVER, What's up with the "Non-Marking" at the bottom? (Picture attached) Haha, It's honestly not a big deal. Just seems like a generic shoe marking.  Overall, it's a solid shoe for what it's advertised. 5/5 Would recommend!
I like these zero drop shoes. They look nice and are comfortable right out of the box. I would not wear them as street shoes but they are fine as slippers and for short outside excursions

评论概述: Great Fit, Feels Like Walking Barefoot
评论详情: Love how these feel—it's like going barefoot but with some protection! They take a bit to break in, but after that, they’re perfect for casual wear or long walks.

I’m always on the look out for wide shoes since I have a 4E wide foot. Most of these barefoot styles look super flat and aren’t very stylish. Not the case with these! They look great, are made well, and seem very durable. My only wish is that they would’ve stuff them with tissue paper to keep the shape during shipping. The toe of the left shoe got crushed in so I’ll have to stuff the toe with paper for a while to fix it. Other than that it’s a great shoe!

评论概述: Look very nice, comfortable, good value
评论详情: This pair of shoes was worn briefly around the house, outside on the patio, in the garage. I am told they fit well, are comfortable for walking, were easy to slip on your feet.  They also look good, are well made. They are nice to wear with jeans, slacks. I was told that these good shoes were for at home, work, shopping, they are not for camping, fishing, hiking, or barn work. They are better suited for casual wear.  Judging from the smile on the shoe tester's face, these are quite good, very comfortable shoes.

Got wide feet ? Want your feet to work as they should !? These are the shoes for you! I am not a fan of All the extra cushion and padding on shoes and shoes squishing my toes !  I’ve bought two pairs in white and the brown ones for work ! Absolutely love them!

评论用户: Muy bien diseño, ,baja calidad  a la segunda vez que me los puse se despegaron

评论详情: Decent shoes for the money but I’ve worn better. Wouldn’t purchase again though.
Quality is okay.  But, these look like clown shoes. Didn't like them at all.

评论概述: Finally a pair of wide fitting shoes that I could purchase regularly
评论详情: I can’t wear normal shoes, my feet are short wide and flat. these are wide fitting and fit like a glove. Left Shoe came with a crease as you can see. the material is like a pleather so you don’t need to worry about them getting scuffed. Only complaint is they don’t come in half sizes. I’m a 9.5 went up to a 10 and they are too big but a 9 would’ve been too small.

These shoes are comfy. They also are stylish and don't scream "barefoot shoe". Which is very hard to do. The only other barefoot company that is stylish and comfy that I have come across is vivo barefoot, and this shoe is 1/3 the price of those shoes. So good job! Please make even more shoe models like these!
I think the whitin are better, I write these one day and the soles are peeling like other people have posted about. Overall they look good but I don’t think they’re going to last long

Pros: These definitely have more toe room which is nice if that is your for shape. I also think these look really good being completely white. I originally was annoyed by the pull shoe laces but they grew on me and I like them now.  Cons: These are really cheaply made shoes. The bottom is incredibly thin and you feel everything. There is a cork insert that is decent but it doesn't make up for it. The shoes also came with some distorted shapes. It took a while but I was able to fix some of them, but I couldn't fix the distortions in the sole. Overall, these are ok but I'd look for something better.

评论概述: Great for foot health/ those with wide feet
评论详情: Exactly as my title says. I have wide feet, and also our feet were made to splay out toes. This is perfect. Looks good feels good. I should mention I live in a city and don't wear these outside in the city. There's a lot of sharp objects, and I don't want to test the thickness of the souls for obvious reasons. But for gym and work my feet feel so much better. If these were offered with the same width but thicker souls I'd never buy anything else.
Lo mejor del mundo

Love these!  way better than the within barefoot shoes (i went thru 4 pairs of those). the look, the feel, the durability are all better than within. i will be buying another pair of these once my current ones need replacing  Edit: added love these at the top. I’ve now bought the whites 3x and also 3 other colors. I seriously love these shoes. The red shoe lace holder looks tacky to me though. So I cut off the plastic tip and tie a few notes to keep the laces in place. Looks much more stylish that way. I will keep coming back to these for a longgg time. I’d rather buy these a few more times at this price point, as opposed to some more expensive barefoot shoes that maybe last a little bit longer but they won’t look as great over time. Seems like a break even point to me. Thank you Pulltop, you’re awesome.

I recently purchased a pair of these Pulltop shoes and while the overall experience was a mix of highs and lows, the end product left a lasting impression. However, the shipping process was less than ideal. Living in Puerto Rico he shipping time was drastically long, I waited almost a month.
Feel amazing on my feet and for the right prize. Trying to get into minimalist shoes and am skeptical 🤨 about the vibrams at 100’s dollars, these are ideal and feel great for the price.

these are ok.. I wasn't blown away by the comfort, and if I'm being honest, they kind of looked a little funny when I put them on.  They aren't bad shoes by any means, but they may just not be my style.. They are decent quality for the price, and should last a while if you're taking care of them properly.

Shoes are comfortable, and I like the style. However, major flaw is durability. I got these March 25, 2024 and they’ve already worn down a bunch (April 27, 2024). 2/5 stars because I’ve worn them less than 50 days and I don’t know how many more I can get out of them.

评论概述: You get what you pay for, as far as durability. but they look sweet and fit well.
评论详情: Pretty sweet. They fit well and look good. Worth what I paid.

Originally bought these for work but have been using them to go out instead. Really comfortable and the insole is great for transitioning into barefoot shoes. Wide toe box allows for a more natural step. Recommend for those transitioning to a minimal light weight shoe. Would not recommend for people looking for arch support.

I really like the design and even got complimented for the shoes on multiple occasions. (That has never happened even with all my beloved Xeros :-) )  Super soft, super comfortable. So far the leather looks great.  The only slight negative is that the rubber lace holder does not really work for me. Without them the laces are a bit too short for my normal height feet.  Otherwise, it seems like a bargain.

评论概述: Felt too flat, like my foot was not being supported. Well it does say ''Minimalist Barefoot''
评论详情: Overall, I think that these shoes are a good pick. Just know that they will feel a bit odd for a while.  Cork insoles are a great feature, I just have not broken those in yet. Not sure that I ever will, these are just not for me I guess. The quality of construction and material choices make these a good value.  Would I recommend these shoes? Only if someone asked me about 'Minimalist' or 'Barefoot' dressier style shoes.  Would I order as a gift? Yes.  Maybe I should have picked a solid color, maybe that bold white & black is my issue here.

I recently purchased these sneakers, and they have become my favorite pair. I like their all white sleek look, and the way that the laces do not need to be tied. The wide toe box allows your feet to move naturally and feels great. The leather is so soft, but also very durable. It is incredible how lightweight the sneakers are. The soul of this shoe is made from some kind of cork and provides a super comfortable feel. I highly recommend these sneakers, and I am definitely going to buy another pair in a different color.

评论概述: These are the perfect barefoot shoes
评论详情: I am a barefoot advocate. I have been for the last 4 years. I made the switch in January 2020, and I went with the more expensive brands. Which I still do love and have their shoes as well. When I saw these Pulltop barefoot shoes here I bought them instantly. They look like another BIG BRAND but don’t have the shape of a foot prison. I’m a doctor and I have been slowly switching my patients to barefoot shoes when they decide they are tired of their foot pain. The moment each one has seen these. They want them. They love the fashionable look, foot shaped feel, and lightweight of them. I hope Pulltop makes more color ways (reds, blues, greens, yellows, etc.) and makes women sizes. I will buy more if they make more colors. And I have already had 5 patients buy these and I’ve only been wearing them for 2 days.
I actually enjoy wearing this shoe. They are very comfortable and when paired with the right outfit it can be very fashionable.

I've been toying with several shoes that have this wide-toe-box and added these to the list to try out, and I must say the look is different but it's not as drastically different as some others I own. The comfort is there too - I've probably worn them for a total of 24 hours now, 6 or 7 hours as a time, and they're great! They fit well, stay put and are decent to walk and run in - i would go jogging in them for exercise, but if you need to chase down a basketball or 5 yr old or something like that they're not uncomfortable or hazardous to sprint in. All in all I am pleased, especially given the price point. They looks good, feel great and will look even better with some glow in the dark (or reflective) laces!
...for those toes makes these one of the most comfortable day off from work shoes I have ever had. Thats all I need to say!

I received my shoes on March 18th, 2024, and have worn them nearly every day since. They have become my favorite pair of shoes. I have some Vivo Barefoot shoes, which are great also. The Vivo does provide more ground feel, but these are more comfortable to me. The only thing I wish is that Pulltop offered more variety in shoes made like these because I would buy them. I have already purchased more barefoot shoes but have already referred others to them. I won't hesitate to purchase these again and may purchase the brown leather anyway.
these shoes are comfy and fit true to size. they are very lightweight and don’t hurt your feet by the end of the day. nice quality, good price
The soles of these shoes are extremely thin, making these feel more like sandals than shoes. The extra width in the toe box is nice but with how flimsy these feel, I don't think I'll use them.
Great looking shoes, comfortable, and wide toe box. Not a fan of the weird orange shoe strings.

Says barefoot. However the corkboard like sole in the shoe feels like you walking on tape. Makes me feel dirty going barefoot in them. However the shoes feel good wearing as a normal shoe. Also looks really good for the price.

My toes have plenty of freedom to wiggle about in these amazingly comfy Barefoot Wide Toe Box Shoes for Men. They work well for both sophisticated and casual settings because to their elegant and adaptable simple style. But there seem to be some problems with the materials' quality. I'm concerned about the shoe's long-term durability because the upper section's stitching appears a little thin. Furthermore, given how little usage I gave them, the sole began to wear down sooner than I had anticipated. Although they are really stylish and comfortable, given the possible lifetime concerns, I'm not sure if they provide the best value for the money.
Got all white pair and this pair. They’re comfortable, wide and look good. Definitely worth the price!

These shoes are cute, comfy, but stink like toxic plastic/rubber when they first arrive! It was incredibly strong when I opened the shipment, I could even smell it through the packaging. I couldn't leave them in my house, so I figured I'd air them out. After about 5 days outside, the smell was at a manageable, mild level. I wore them a couple days while I was in NOLA, and they stood up to Bourbon street! Now, the smell is practically gone, and they're actually decent shoes!
I would love them to be a little prettier. But they are extremely comfortable

In general I like these shoes alot. They have a nice style about them. They are very comfortable and easy to slip on and off. They are made of really soft pu leather that actually feels alot like real leather. They are easy to wipe clean with a damp cloth. I will note that when you first get these they have a strong odor and it will go away but if you plan on wearing them straight from the box you will smell a strong smell. I think it's because it's all man-made materials. Anyway after a couple of days the smell is about gone. Smell aside they are great shoes and leave my feet feeling fresh. A good value for what you get.

I had been thinking about trying out some wide toe box shoes for a little while, and liked how these ones looked, even though they didn't have a ton of reviews yet. I have to say, I've been pleasantly surprised. They look great, I went with the solid white pair, and they feel like a decent quality pair of shoes. The material is nice. I'm not a huge fan of the zero drop idea, but I think if it bothers me enough, I could always just grab a pair of inserts to add some heel height. As of now, I've worn them for a couple of 12 hour work shifts and they're okay. I'm on and off my feet, so having some rest is nice. My feel get a little sore after a few hours on my feet, but that's normal enough and tough to avoid. I will say, the one thing they don't do great is breathe. I feel like my feet end up a little hot and sweaty. I may try making the little holes that are there for design into through holes to see if that helps vent some of the heat.  Overall, not bad and I am happy with them. I may try another pair in the future. I will see how long these last. I don't wear them every day, so hopefully a few months if not more.

评论概述: X5 STAR MUST HAVE!!! ..Hubby says BEST shoe to wear at conventions..!!!
评论详情: I won’t lie.. at first glance, I felt they look like a clown shoe with their wide toe box area in solid stark white and larger sz. 12 option! Yet, the moment my husband tried it on.. he was smitten!! As one who travels x3-4 monthly for work: walking jobsites, attending conventions, symposiums.. frequenting every International airport miles a day on his feet- it’s not ideal for one who’s post bunion surgery let alone, those with healthy feet may hurt! Trying around town- he couldnt believe how feather light of a shoe it was.. the bamboo cushion is solid for wicking moisture and creating step/arch support. But what he loves is the non constricting toe area… finds it’s far different than a standard “wide width” shoe. Said this has a regular fit throughout.. just extra space where it’s needed most! After x4 days at convention last wk. he had not a single blister by simple pairing with an athletic sock!! No extra bandaid or mule skin like usual.. WoW!!  Shoe itself is easy on/off- offers x2 insoles options.. mine left both in play! Personally, he loves the aesthetics and thinks laces are coolest he’s ever had with the “no tie” system.. plus, he loves the bright orange pop! *This is where I voice my one complaint: losing x1 of the lace stoppers and no replacements online- we had to improvise..!! Seller take note: it would be ideal to include an extra set of lace stoppers bc, at some point these are bound to fall off.. how perfect to have extra set as needed..?!! If nothing else- list as option to buy replacements!  Working Hack: use a 4-6mm silicone round bead with 1.5mm threading hole.. if cut smack down the middle, it creates x2 working lace stoppers and can be done in any color. This was best fix I came up with and wow.. it was a solid solution + worked perfectly. (See pic I included to show my idea.. slide flat half down onto lace!)  Clean enough in look, solid stitching is shown on our pair as you can see.. This design is useful for business casual and comfortable enough for any activity you can think of.. work or play! Hoping info can help you- stay safe everyone.  **UPDATE: 7months later- let's just say he's gotten his moneys worth and then some..!!! Worn almost daily and taken on boating, hiking, biking, vacation adventures.. i'm back for another pair! You can see photos- these will take a beating.. we just need them to look the part again!

The shoes feel like walking barefoot, fitting your feet comfortably with wide toes. They're made with top-notch materials: soft PU leather, breathable holes, padded lining, sweat-absorbing insoles, and durable rubber outsoles. You can wear them easily, either as shoes or slippers, thanks to the collapsible heel. I got the white version and it goes really well with clothes. You can adjust them effortlessly with the elastic laces. If you have a high arch in your feet, it may feel very tight in the arch area. Replace it with regular laces should fix the problem. they're tough, easy to clean. Love it

评论概述: Red lace caps missing on one foot
评论详情: Not really too pleased with these sneakers. The red lace caps are missing from one shoe. Not really comfortable. Could offer more arch support. I don’t recommend.

From the second I put these on they felt comfortable and looked good. As a vegan, my options in the budget friendly minimalist sneaker market are extremely limited. These were exactly what I was looking for. I highly recommend them to anyone, vegan or not.

These shoes are comfy and they look great! My gripe is that my first pair came used and the second pair the stitching on the left shoe was bunched up on the toe area and the right shoe was slightly warped. And my biggest gripe is that the shoes have a STRONG chemical odor. It’s too bad because they are comfortable and look great and are well priced.

I wasn’t sure how I’d feel about zero-drop shoes but I’m happy to say, I really like these. These are incredibly comfortable. The cork soles on the inside are actually soft and feel great and I’ve been wearing them without socks too. I like that you don’t really need to tie them as well. Highly recommended.

评论概述: Great for a trip to the Destiny Islands!
评论详情: Despite how wide these shoes are, they are very light weight and comfortable. Love the aglets used to keep the laces taut!  Theses do give big Sora vibes...

Cushiony and comfortable to wear. Fits as expected. Love the slip on laces. Well constructed without defects. Honestly, I don’t love the look of the wide toe box - it gives me clown shoe vibes. But I can’t argue with the fact that they’re better for your feet! I guess I’m still getting used to it. But if you’re ok with the look, then these are a solid pair of shoes. Overall, pretty happy for $40. 4 stars.
These pulltop barefoot shoes for men are very comfortable and fit as expected. Slip on. Widely made for extra comfort. Great for walking. Lightweight. Recommendable.

I was pleasantly surprised with these shoes. Initially, I was a bit nervous as I hadn't heard of the brand before. However, I was in the market for zero-drop barefoot shoes with a wide toe box. Some name-brand options I came across were priced well over $130. Opting for the all-white version, I found that they are remarkably easy to clean using a magic eraser, thanks to the material.  What impressed me most was the design – despite the wide toe box, they don't have that "clown shoes" appearance. I was so thrilled with my purchase that I ended up buying two pairs.

I was surprised how these were comfortable (in moderate temperatures) since I don't like not wearing socks. With my feet being in direct contact with the sole I wonder what it'll feel like when it gets hot in the summer, but in the moderate temperatures of early March they feel fine.  I'm sure it isn't just because I'm not wearing crew socks, but I think the thin sole of the shoe may be an issue for pants wearers, as I notice my pants are hitting the ground now so I keep having to hike them up. I think these shoes are better suited to sweatpants or shorts, not full length pants unless you have them sized to no reach the ground when you are barefoot.

I've just given these men's dress sneakers a whirl, and frankly, they've completely won me over. Finding a fit that's just right, especially in a size 14, feels like striking gold. These sneakers nailed it, fitting like a glove straight out of the box.  The real star for me is the wide-toe box. It's as if it was made keeping in mind those of us blessed with larger feet. It's spacious without looking bulky, a rare feat that combines comfort with sleek design. For the first time in ages, I've slipped into shoes that didn't feel like a compromise between style and comfort.  Then there's the look - the white soles against the rich brown leather strike such a sophisticated balance, that you can't help but admire them. They've got this classic appeal with a twist, perfect for dressing up without feeling overdone.  Quality-wise, they're solid. The shoelaces, often an afterthought in many shoes, are sturdy and tie smoothly, which is more appreciated than you might think. And the insoles are like walking on air, making long days on your feet a breeze.  If you're on the hunt for a pair of dress sneakers that checks all boxes - style, comfort, and quality, without the usual hassle of finding 'the one' in larger sizes, I'd point you straight to these. They're a rare find that elevates casual dress without trying too hard.

评论概述: Good for slippers around the house
评论详情: My son likes that these are easy to slide on and off. They do not provide any support for the sides of your feet so they are better suited for around the house or short walks. The finish of them matches the pictures perfectly and they look good. They definitely give him a good "barefoot" feeling, which he needs during his down time from playing sports - these help relieve his tired achy feet.

First and foremost, these sneakers are super comfortable. The leather is soft and feels like it's already broken in. The padding around the collar is plush and the elastic laces make this shoe very slip-on/off friendly.  It comes with a sole insert that provides a firm cushion that is supportive, but not pillow soft. Optionally, you can remove this entirely and get a nice zero drop barefoot experience. The heel is also collapsible so you can wear these as mules or house slippers.. and they are also pretty stylish.  Overall a nice pair of shoes that is versatile and very affordable.

评论概述: Finally, some minimalist shoes that look good.
评论详情: I have been wanting some minamalist shoes with wide toe boxes for some time but they all look unusual, kind of like how most hybrid cars look unnecessarily weird. You can have aero dynamics and style in cars, so can you have comfort and style in shoes.  As a long time fan of the styling of the Nike Airforce One or Court, these are perfect. They are like flat wide versions of those. They are also very light weight, flexible and easy to get on and off. They look good and I have enjoyed walking around in them today. I did not experience any fatigue and traction is great.  That said, let's address the negatives, which are both related to the material. Firstly, it is very thin and I am worried about longevity. Secondly, as a vegan leather aka pleather, they do make my feet sweat a bit. I will continue to wear them and see what comes of it. If they hold up a year and a different sock helps in the other area, I will certainly be changing my rating to 5 stars and buying all the colors available, in multiples. Who knows how long these gems will remain available.
cool shoes, but cork insoles are not it. i took them out and put in real insoles.

I recently got these barefoot design shoes and couldn't be happier! The wide-toe design ensures my feet have plenty of room to move and breathe, making them incredibly comfortable to wear all day long.  And let's talk about the craftsmanship. The upper is crafted from premium soft-touch PU leather, which not only looks sleek but also feels incredibly soft against my skin. The strategically placed air holes ensure superior breathability, keeping my feet cool and fresh even on the hottest days. And the padded lining adds an extra layer of comfort and stability, making these shoes perfect for long walks or days on your feet.  The insoles are where the real magic happens. With sweat-absorbing wooden chips and high-density memory foam, they offer unparalleled arch support and cushioning. I've never felt so supported in a pair of shoes before! And the durable rubber outsoles provide excellent slip resistance, giving me peace of mind with every step.  What I love most about these shoes is their versatility. The collapsible heel counter makes them easy to slip on and off, so I can wear them as slippers around the house or as regular shoes for running errands. And the adaptive lacing system means I never have to worry about tying my shoes again - a small detail, but one that makes a big difference in my daily routine.  And let's not forget about maintenance. The reinforced seam connections between the upper and outsole increase durability, so I know these shoes will last me for years to come. And because they're so easy to clean, I can spend less time worrying about upkeep and more time enjoying the comfort they provide.  Plus, the fact that they're odorless is a huge bonus. I can feel good about wearing these shoes knowing that they're environmentally friendly and won't emit any unpleasant smells.  These barefoot design shoes have exceeded all my expectations, and I would highly recommend them to anyone in search of comfort, quality, and style.

One of my sons has very wide feet and I usually order him a size 13 in shoes, which is about 2 sizes more than he should need length-wise to get shoes to fit him. He usually only wears boots, as those seem to provide him with more comfort. I ordered these Barefoot Wide Toe Box Shoes for Men in a size 12, hoping that since they were made with wide feet in mind, a size 13 wouldn’t be needed. I’m very happy I took the chance. My son was a tad hesitant at first, seeing as he hasn’t worn anything but boots in years. I asked him just to try them on so I could review them. They must have felt really good on his feet, because I have now seen him wear them to school every day of the week! Teenagers are hard to please, so I know I can fully recommend these shoes. He says they are super comfortable. An added bonus is that you don’t have to tie these shoes. The laces are somewhat elastic, making it easy to put these shoes on. The little red stoppers on the ends, keep the laces in place. So, these shoes are very handy for people who are unable to tie their laces. When he stepped in these shoes for the first time, they felt a little tight on his little toes. However, I moved the laces around a bit, and they adjusted and gave him more space. Overall, we’re very happy with these shoes. They look nice, are practical, and feel comfortable.
